Cyber Arts Camp

Solar 'n Solder

Transmission

Sustainability of our projects is very important. Today we are going to learn how to add solar power to our project. Imagine harnessing the power of the sun and using that power to light up your LEDs. During the day your project will gather energy and and night will illuminate in a dazzling pattern.

Ascent Checklist

  • Clean workspace
  • Arduino Uno + USB Cable
  • Breadboard
  • 2 More Jumper Cables
  • Neopixel Strip Light
  • Photoresistor (Light Sensor)
  • Solar Panel
  • Solar Board
  • Soldering Iron & Solder
  • Wire Clippers
  • Both Resistor Types

Links

  • Solar Power Wikipedia - Read more about solar power and how it’s changing our world.

Mission

  • Soldering - Soldering can be a dangerous activity due to how hot the soldering iron can get. Make sure to have a clean workspace and follow all safety precaution before starting. Follow Ji and Alice and solder your components to create your solar powered system.

  • Arrange Your Lights In Your Dome - Add your Solar Powered LED component to your dome home and enjoy!
